title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: e-Learning System Development and Management Practical Skills Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Establish design plans reflecting learner characteristics (adult professionals) and technical infrastructure requirements when developing e-learning systems

Learners can convert at least three mathematics education contents into mobile-friendly formats (e.g., interactive quizzes, video lectures, infographics) within one week and submit results meeting at least four out of five mobile optimization checklist criteria.

Learners can identify three technical issues (e.g., access failures, content playback errors) and two educational issues (e.g., delayed progress, insufficient understanding) occurring in e-learning operations and propose solutions within 48 hours using institutional support systems (FAQ documents, real-time chat support, weekly review meetings).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
